# AI Timetable Frontend - Project Setup

## Project Overview

Modern React TypeScript frontend for AI-based timetable generation system with authentication, timetable management, program management, constraint management, and AI optimization features.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

<!-- React TypeScript frontend with Material-UI, state management, API integration with FastAPI backend -->

- [x] Scaffold the Project
<!-- Create React TypeScript project with Vite -->

- [x] Customize the Project
<!-- Add components for authentication, timetables, programs, constraints, AI features -->

- [x] Install Required Extensions
<!-- React, TypeScript, ESLint extensions -->

<!-- Install dependencies and resolve issues -->

- [x] Create and Run Task
<!-- Create development server task -->

<!-- Start development server -->

<!-- Update README and clean up instructions -->

- [ ] Launch the Project
<!-- Start development server -->

- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete
<!-- Update README and clean up instructions -->

## Technical Stack

- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- Material-UI (MUI) for components
- React Query for API state management
- React Router for navigation
- Axios for API calls
- React Hook Form for forms
- Zustand for global state management
